content: Figure 3:  Estimated Inflation-Adjusted  Natural Rates of Interest  Note:  Data are 4-quarter moving averages of equilibrium short-term policy rates. Source:  Kathryn Holston, Thomas Laubach, and John C. Williams (forthcoming).  “Measuring the Natural Rate of Interest: International Trends and   Determinants,” in Richard Clarida and Lucrezia Reichlin, organizers, NBER International Seminar on Macroeconomics 2016. Amsterdam:  Journal of  International Economics (Elsevier).
